fields.name: Replacement Weapon:
fields.value: Favonius Warbow, Elegy for the End

fields.name: Main Stats Priority
fields.value: <sands> Energy Recharge |<goblet>  Cryo DMG Bonus %  |<circlet>  CRIT Rate / CRIT DMG

fields.name: Talent Priority
fields.value:
**1)** Elemental Burst: Prophecies of Dawn
**2)** Elemental Skill: Frozen Wilds
**3)** Normal Attack: Rapid Fire

fields.name: Notes:
fields.value:
Normal Attack talents can be ignored for this build.
The instructor set cannot be used if there are no reactions being triggered, aim for Energy Recharge on the substats to utilize the Noblesse Oblige set buff. CRIT Rate will have to be decently high to use the Favonius Bow passive.
